captions.text: Subscribe to our english channel: Everything about your pet!
https://www.youtube.com/user/allaboutyourpet
I am trying to draw here
more or less the difference between a normal, resting
uterus
and a gravid or pregnant uterus.
What does gravid mean? It means that the uterus contains
babies, that its a pregnant uterus.
The pregnancy normally occurs
in the uterine horns.
This is where the babies will
normally be. You can
find from two
to a maximum of about five.
Right, so here we can see...
these would be the fetus
that are located in
as I have previously said in the uterine horn,
Right, I want you to know which is the normal way out, this is
a normal uterus.
the way out has to always be in the direction of the vagina
and the uterus is a structure closed at its cranial
poles. During the birth, the babies
take the direction
towards the vagina, and I want to explain it directly on Aphrodite
that is pregnant right now.
Alright, alright.
It is normal in a guinea pig to make these squeaks and noises. Each squeak means someting
and right now she is complaining.
Right.
If I compare it with the drawing,
you can see that this Y is placed more or less here,
its like a tree shape
or a Y
here you have the trunk
and here the horns
that go upwards.
More or less, this is the normal position and shape it has.
When she is pregnant, they become much wider.
for this reason, the belly
grows as you can see
here with Aphrodite which is two weeks pregnant
and that her belly has grown a bit.
What do we need? It is important that you know this because pregnant
guinea pigs have a few nutritional and environmental
special needs.
The first thing is the nest, that I want to show you right now.
This is a type of shed, more or less like
a nest
for a guinea pig.
its great for guinea pigs, rabbits, chinchillas...
having suitable dimensions for this size of pets
and it has to be dark and quite. We normally
fill in
the base with a special bedding
like this one here called Sweet Dreams,
because it is the only one in the market,
it is a very hygienic bedding
made from highly resistant cellulose, this cellulose
is very strong.
Basically it keeps the nest warm and clean,
this way we make them feel comfortable
especially in the beginning they feel unsafe, but we will place them inside
you will see that once they feel safe and warm, especially with
animals and females that are pregnant, they will love to spend time
inside.
And we must leave them alone. A pregnant animal needs
rest and no stress, a lot of calmness. It would be
convenient that children leave them alone, at least until
the babies are born and have a certain age.
Therefore, just like humans, moderated exercise is good for them
but try to cancel playing with children. They need a lot of rest,
darkness and a lot of peace in their nest.
What else do they need? Well they need a rich in calcium diet.
You can see here.
Basically we have put some alfalfa hay
because alfalfa hays have more calcium than normal,
and a suitable feed for guinea pigs. Fruit and vegetables as
always. The green leaves are generally very
rich in calcium and is what they eat best.
But, we can also give them a calcium supplement. I like
calcium 20, that you can find in the chemist's, this one that I
have here...now you will see how I give her more or less one milliliter aproximately
every 48 hours.
from the last third of the pregnancy and until the guinea pig is still feeding
the babies, because the milk
needs to have very important calcium levels so the bones
keep strong. We will feed her calcium 20,
about one milliter every 48 hours, which is approximately the correct dosage
or half a milliliter per day, wich is more or less the same.
Come here fatty,
Well
these squeaks are complaints, there is nothing wrong, dont be afraid. Guinea pigs
have a very wide vocabulary, I will explain it to you one day
and with this noise she is telling me that she is protesting.
but you see she loves it and she's eating it
very very well.

title: COBAYAS, CUYES  - Cuidados durante el embarazo
